sentence: Tillis has even endorsed one of Cawthorn's opponents in the May GOP primary, State Senator Chuck Edwards.
author: Darragh Roche
title: Will 'Orgy' Claims Cost Madison Cawthorn His GOP Career?

sentence: Last month, Cawthorn led the polls by 32 points against GOP candidate Chuck Edwards, 52 percent to 20 percent.
author: Patricia McKnight
title: National Rifle Association Throws Weight Behind Cawthorn Reelection

title: National Rifle Association Throws Weight Behind Cawthorn Reelection

sentence: The incumbent congressman is still supported by 38 percent of GOP voters, compared to 21 percent who back his top rival, state Senator Chuck Edwards.
author: Jason Lemon
title: Madison Cawthorn Losing GOP Support Despite Keeping Large Primary Lead
